sentences: Nam Da-won (Korean: 남다원; born April 16, 1997), better known by the mononym Dawon, is a South Korean singer and actress.
She is a member of the South Korean-Chinese girl group WJSN.
Early life ==
Dawon was born on April 16, 1997.
She graduated from Chungdam High School.
Career ==
Pre-debut ===
Dawon appeared on the second season of the South Korean reality television competition show K-pop Star 2, which aired in 2012.
She joined Starship Entertainment as a trainee sometime afterwards.

sentences: On February 25, 2016, made her debut with WJSN with their first EP, Would You Like?, and its lead singles, "Mo Mo Mo" and "Catch Me".
